Programming Utilities

 Table-of-Contents
  • for CP/M
  • for PC-DOS
  • for Windows ??

Miscellaneous Utilities (running on CP/M platforms and emulators)

  • ZEXALL, a Z80 instruction set exerciser.

Miscellaneous Utilities (running on PC-DOS platform)

  • BIN2DB.ZIP Binary file to DB converter, Very useful for including data files in assempler source code
  • HexStuff.ZIP Hex to Binary converter, Bin to HEX, Hex to Hex (it fixes the file) And: The HEX file format description
  • Utilities for Embedded Programmers Mike Page.
  • ROMutils.zip contains DOS programs to extract and manipulate system ROMS.

Miscellaneous Utilities (running on MS-Windows ?? platform)

  • HEXCNV (V 1.0) HexDecBin Converter, Makes number translation easier
  • HEXEDT (V 1.5) HexEditor
  • z80 Opcode to Mnemonic Translator, written in C, by James Ball.
